name: Block Partay
description:
Block Partay is a simple little block game where you merged colors together to make black tiles. When you merge black tiles together you score points and a space is created in the puzzle. Play until there is no more moves. There is 3 levels so once you finish the first one jump to the next. 

Keys are simple - just use the arrow keys to slide up, down, right, left

Merge Colors

  •  Red -> Blue = Purple + Yellow = Black
  • Red -->Green =Brown + Blue = Black
  • Red -->Yellow=Orange + Red =Brown + Blue = Black

I put this game together over the last couple nights so give it a try let me know what you think in the comments.
